story:
Once upon a time, in the beautiful mountainous country of Tajikistan, there lived a little girl named Laila. Laila was a kind and curious child who loved to explore the world around her.

One night, as Laila lay in bed looking up at the twinkling stars through her window, she noticed a shooting star streak across the sky. Excitedly, she closed her eyes and made a wish with all her heart.

The next morning, Laila woke up to find a tiny, magical bird sitting on her windowsill. The bird chirped a sweet melody and Laila knew in her heart that it was there to grant her wish.

The bird introduced itself as Zara, the guardian of dreams, and told Laila that she had been chosen to embark on a special adventure to a land of enchantment. Without hesitation, Laila agreed to go on this wondrous journey.

Zara whisked Laila away on her back, flying high above the clouds and across the mountains of Tajikistan. They soared over lush green valleys, sparkling rivers, and majestic snow-capped peaks. Laila marveled at the beauty of her homeland from this bird's-eye view.

As they landed in a hidden valley, Laila was greeted by friendly creatures and colorful flowers that sang songs of happiness. She danced with fairies, shared stories with wise old trees, and played with mischievous mountain goats.

But as the sun began to set, Laila realized it was time to return home. Zara flew her back to her bedroom window, promising to visit her in her dreams whenever she wished.

Laila closed her eyes, feeling grateful for the magical adventure she had just experienced. As she drifted off to sleep, she knew that the wonders of Tajikistan would always be with her, keeping her dreams alive.

And so, every night, Laila fell asleep with a smile on her face, knowing that her dreams would always be filled with beauty, magic, and the spirit of her homeland.

The end. Goodnight, sweet dreams.
